card.name: ARK Draft Archetypes ARK
card.text: {W}{B} YOG The God of Balance is aggressive with his boons and blessings. {B}{G} CORVASH Death is but the beginning for the truly strong. {G}{U} GEESH May the blessings of Geesh proliferate far and wide. {U}{R} VO'RADH Invoke spells from your graveyard and find true power. {R}{W} CHURCH OF THE EAGLE Arm yourself with faith and prayer and win with prowess. {W}{U} ARTIFACTS Trinkets and relics of great power fuel your coven. {U}{B} FEROCIOUS Strength may come in numbers, but your creatures excel by themselves. {B}{R} SACRIFICE Life is cheap and death is plentiful. Benefit from this mortality. {R}{G} MUTANTS Not all are blessed in the same way; embrace your mutant kin. {G}{W} COUNTERS Forge your faith strong and true with +1/+1 counters.

card.text: Exchange your graveyard and library. Then shuffle your library. You may put a card from your hand on top of your library. Exile Procession of Souls.

card.name: Cardinal Sin

card.name: Wrack the Mind
card.text: Each player exiles all instant and sorcery cards from their graveyard, then reveals their hand and discards all instant and sorcery cards revealed this way, then puts all cards they exiled this way into their hand. Exile Wrack the Mind.

card.name: Fall from Grace

card.name: Folk Altar
card.text: As Folk Altar enters the battlefield, choose two colors. Creatures you control get +1/+1 for each of the chosen colors they are. Whenever you basic land is tapped for mana of one of the chosen colors, add an additional one mana of that color.
